          <title>
            <string language="en">Chromatography: spreading of substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chromatographie: Verbreiten der Substanzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chromatographie : propagation des 
substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chromatography: espalhar das substâncias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cromatografia: diffusione delle sostanze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρωματογραφία: διάδοση των ουσιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cromatografía: el separarse de sustancias</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that in chromatography, substances spread across the paper at different speeds.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chromatography. chromatogram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">colours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spreading</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß in der 
Chromatographie, die Substanzen, die über dem Papier mit 
unterschiedlichen Geschwindigkeiten verbritten werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'en chromatographie, 
substances écartées à travers le papier à différentes vitesses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que no chromatography, 
substâncias espalhadas através do papel em velocidades diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che in cromatografia,
sostanze sparse attraverso la carta alle velocità differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει αυτής στη χρωματογραφία, 
ουσίες που διαδίδονται πέρα από το έγγραφο με τις διαφορετικές 
ταχύτητες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que en cromatografía, 
sustancias separadas a través del papel a diversas velocidades.</string>
          </description>
